channel.title: About the wild
channel.description: how do i make my server to were the wild level is like normal rs and not just every were

item.title: About the wild
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

open client.java and search for

Nonwild

and replace the whole boolean with

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; }

Save, compile & enjoy.

EDIT: What this does is that you can only pk in the actually wilderness.

Read full topic

item.title: About the wild
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Let me ask you something:

You want a code making it so that its wilderness at the exact same places like reall rs2? Because i have one but i just want to make sure first that this is what your looking for?

Read full topic

item.title: About the wild
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Alright… I take no credits for this. Just doing it to help someone…

Go to client.java, and find… END OF ANTI DUPING, or, if you find /RANGE/… Then scroll down… Under there, replace what you have, with the following…

public int WildyLevel = 0;
public int leftwild = 0;
public boolean InWildrange = false;
public boolean inSafezone = false;
public void WriteWildyLevel() {
int oldlevel = WildyLevel; 
WildyLevel = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
if(inSafezone()){
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@lre@SAFE!", 199);
} else { 
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@yel@level "+WildyLevel , 199);
}
} else {
writePlayers();
}
}

public boolean inSafezone() {
if ((absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112))
return true;
else
return false;
}

public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat)
{
if(((combat + WildyLevel >= pcombat) && (pcombat >= combat)) || ((combat - WildyLevel <= pcombat) && (pcombat <= combat)))
{
InWildrange = true;
}
else
{
InWildrange = true;
}
}

Credits: 100% to the guy who made it… ;)…
(H) + post any errors, shouldn’t be though, cause i use it

Read full topic
